HowItWorksPage.title: How NoRug.fun Works
HowItWorksPage.subtitle: The trenches, with a helmet on.
HowItWorksPage.founderCardP1: Propose a token creation and set (with a 10% max):
HowItWorksPage.founderCardL1: The percentage of the supply airdropped to you.
HowItWorksPage.founderCardL2: The lockup period for your share of the supply.
HowItWorksPage.founderCardP2: Users can then support your proposal by investing SOL in it, similar to a presale.
HowItWorksPage.founderCardP3: If it reaches the top 10 proposals: Congrats! Your token is created, and you receive your percentage of the supply.
HowItWorksPage.founderCardP4: If it's not successful enough: The proposal is rejected.
HowItWorksPage.coFounderCardP1: Find a token creation proposal that appeals to you and support it by investing SOL.
HowItWorksPage.coFounderCardP2: If it reaches the top 10 proposals: Congrats! The token you supported is created, and you receive a share of the supply proportional to the SOL you invested.
HowItWorksPage.coFounderCardP3: If it's not successful enough: Congrats! You get your SOL back!
HowItWorksPage.coFounderCardP4: That's what we call a WIN/WIN situation.
HowItWorksPage.phase2P1: NoRug.fun handles minting, token distribution (to the creator and investors), and creates the liquidity pool with the raised SOL through Meteora.
HowItWorksPage.phase2P2: Investors in non-selected proposals can reclaim their funds.
HowItWorksPage.phase2P3: Everyone can then trade these tokens as usual.
